name: Arc'teryx Sawyer Coat - Men's
description:
Backcountry weather protection refined for city life. The Sawyer is updated with supple waterproof-breathable fabric that reduces it's overall weight, while still providing a barrier between you and the elements. Minimalist style doesn’t mean minimal features. It has articulated patterning, a laminated hem and technology that creates a light, durable, packable jacket to suit cold, wet days.Supple 3-layer GORE-TEX material has soft tricot backer.Fully taped seams, keeping you dry in heavy rain.Laminated construction with micro-seam allowances keep weight and bulk to a minimum.Adjustable hood has a short brim that helps keep the rain off your face.Articulated pattering and underarm gussets prevent binding or bunching.WaterTight™ weatherproof zippers on pockets and front keep the elements out.Inset side pockets keep your hands and your daily necessities out of the rain.Single zippered chest pocket to stash your phone.Adjustable cuffs.Regular fit has room to layer, while maintaining a trim silhouette.
